Posts.Content: I am new to this message board but have been on the thyroid cancer message board for two years.  i am almost 47 years old.  in 2006 went through thyroid cancer.  last week mamogram and ultrasound found nodules on left breast.  dr. is putting together a game plan and will call next week.  my concern is my sister, now 57, had breast cancer exactly ten years ago.  hoping this is just a wake up call and no more. wondering if anyone else out there had thyroid cancer prior to breast cancer because i hear there is a corralation? any advise to ask dr. for any special tests, etc.? smile j
Posts.Title: just looking for advise

Posts.Content: Thank you for the advise.  I looked at the 1-23 date and it sounds alarming.  i also was diagnosed with fibromylagia and dr.'s have thought for years i must have an auto immune problem.  now this breast issue.  can't wait to hear from my dr. in the next couple days.  want to be checked more. thank you again j
Posts.Title: just looking for advise
